overview: High-octane, full-speed, muscled man sex in the gritty auto shop is what's in store in 'Drive Shaft'. You're in for a hell of a ride with these stud mechanics, who will have you inspecting your undercarriage and holding onto your 'Drive Shaft'. This full-throttle joy ride directed by Award-winner Tony Dimarco will get anyone revved up with Stallion-powered fucking. Mechanic Sean Zevran can't resist co-worker Tegan Zayne's succulent ass, and he drives his dip-stick in deep all over the shop. Rev up your engines and hold onto your cocks, because 'Drive Shaft' delivers on all cylinders and doesn't let you go until you're exploding with cum.
title: Drive Shaft
